title: Ticket #4572: configure a filetransfer plugin for irods to run with root priv
description:
Assume you are running HTCondor v8.2.3 or above.

  • Place all these files (attached to ticket) in some directory, aka /path/to/irods_root_plugin

  • Edit irods_root_plugin.C and modify the two #defines at the top

  • Run "make" to build the irods_root_plugin (or compile by hand)

  • permissions should be as follows: 
    % ls -l
total 32
 4 -rwxr-xr-x 1 condor  condor    242 Aug 26 13:35 irods_plugin.sh*
16 -rwxr-xr-x 1 root    condor  12579 Aug 26 14:35 irods_root_plugin*
 4 -rw------- 1 condor  condor   1674 Aug 26 14:35 irods_root_plugin.C
 4 -rw------- 1 root    condor     10 Aug 26 13:26 magic_pass
 4 -rw------- 1 condor  condor     92 Aug 26 14:00 Makefile

  • add to condor_config file: 
    filetransfer_plugins = /path/to/irods_root_plugin
RUN_FILETRANSFER_PLUGINS_WITH_ROOT = True

  • add to job submit file: 
    # there must be exactly one input and output file so the plugin is invoked exactly once for input and once for output
transfer_input_files = irods://dev/null
transfer_output_files = /dev/null
output_destination = irods://dev/null
should_transfer_files = Yes
when_to_transfer_output = ON_EXIT

  • Root debug log is written into /tmp/zkm-d.$$

  • Plugin debug log is written into /tmp/zkm-p.$$
